title: New: Alicia Eris – The 21st
content:
Having taken a little while off from ‘blogging’, what better to come back to than a brand new track from San Diego’s Alicia Eris.

The follow-up to her mightily impressive debut track I Moved On that saw her gaining coverage from several top blogs, The 21st recalls more of the soulful Winehouse inspirations that she refers to. Check out The 21st below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
